Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

18  KSGenConversion::KSGenConversion() :
19  fForceCreation( false ),
20  fIsotope( 0 )
21  {
22  }
23  KSGenConversion::~KSGenConversion()
24  {
25  delete fDataFile;
26  }

28  bool KSGenConversion::Initialize( int isotope )
29  {
30  SetIsotope( isotope );
31 
32  if( ReadData() == false )
33  {
34  genmsg( eError ) << "KSGenConversion::KSGenConversion" << ret;
35  genmsg << "unknown ERROR reading file. quit." << eom;
36  return false;
37  }
38  else
39  {
40  return false;
41  }
42  }
43 
44  void KSGenConversion::CreateCE( vector< int >& vacancy, vector< double >& energy )
45  {
46  //for the case of krypton the probability of producing a CE is very high, there are two transitions in both a CE can be produced
47  //the for loop is running over all possible transitions
48  //for each transition it is diced whether an conversion electron is produced in that transition
49  //many CE can be produced
50  //however, since there is no normalization of each transition, it can rarely happen that no CE is produced
51  DoDoubleConversion = 0;
52 
53  if( fForceCreation == false )
54  {
55  for( unsigned int j = 0; j < fConvProb.size(); j++ )
56  {
57  double myRandNr = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform();
58  unsigned int i = 0;
59  while( myRandNr > 0 && i < fConvProb.at( j ).size() )
60  {
61  myRandNr -= fConvProb.at( j ).at( i );
62  i++;
63  }
64  if( myRandNr < 0 )
65  {
66  DoDoubleConversion = fDoubleConv.at( j ).at( i - 1 );
67  vacancy.push_back( fShell.at( j ).at( i - 1 ) );
68  energy.push_back( fConvE.at( j ).at( i - 1 ) );
69  break;
70  }
71  }
72 
73  if( DoDoubleConversion != 0 )
74  {
75  double myRandNr = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform();
76  unsigned int i = 0;
77  while( myRandNr > 0 && i < fConvProb.at( DoDoubleConversion - 1 ).size() )
78  {
79  myRandNr -= fConvProb.at( DoDoubleConversion - 1 ).at( i );
80  i++;
81  }
82  if( myRandNr < 0 )
83  {
84  genmsg( eDebug ) << "Double Conversion Happened!" << eom;
85  vacancy.push_back( fShell.at( DoDoubleConversion - 1 ).at( i - 1 ) );
86  energy.push_back( fConvE.at( DoDoubleConversion - 1 ).at( i - 1 ) );
87  }
88  }
89  }
90 
91  if( fForceCreation == true )
92  {
93  //for the case of radon (for instance) the probability for producing a CE is very low.
94  //To speed up the simulation, all transition probabilities can be normalized to 1, to force the creation of a CE.
95  //No hierarchy is considered in that case
96  //In this case a single CE must be produced
97  double myRandNr = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform();
98  unsigned int i = 0;
99  unsigned int j = 0;
100  while( myRandNr > 0 && j < fConvProbNorm.size() )
101  {
102  i = 0;
103  while( myRandNr > 0 && i < fConvProbNorm.at( j ).size() )
104  {
105 
106  myRandNr -= fConvProbNorm.at( j ).at( i );
107  i++;
108  }
109  j++;
110  }
111  if( myRandNr < 0 )
112  {
113  vacancy.push_back( fShell.at( j - 1 ).at( i - 1 ) );
114  energy.push_back( fConvE.at( j - 1 ).at( i - 1 ) );
115  }
116  else
117  {
118  genmsg( eError ) << "KSGenConversion::CreateCE" << ret;
119  genmsg << ": no conversionVacancy." << eom;
120  }
121  }
122  }
123 
124  bool KSGenConversion::ReadData()
125  {
126 
127  double prob, probNorm, energy, probTotal = 0;
128  int shell, doubleconv, transition;
129 
130  if( fIsotope == 219 )
131  {
132  fDataFile = katrin::CreateDataTextFile( "ConversionRn219.dat" );
133  }
134  else if( fIsotope == 220 )
135  {
136  fDataFile = katrin::CreateDataTextFile( "ConversionRn220.dat" );
137  }
138  else if( fIsotope == 83 )
139  {
140  fDataFile = katrin::CreateDataTextFile( "ConversionKr83.dat" );
141  }
142  else if( fIsotope == 210 )
143  {
144  fDataFile = katrin::CreateDataTextFile( "ConversionPb210.dat" );
145  }
146  else
147  {
148  genmsg( eError ) << "KSGenConversion::ReadData" << ret;
149  genmsg << "Isotope " << fIsotope << " not supported by conversion process!" << eom;
150  }
151 
152  if( fDataFile->Open( katrin::KFile::eRead ) == true )
153  {
154 
155  fstream& inputfile = *(fDataFile->File());
156 
157  int oldtransition = -1;
158 
159  while( !inputfile.eof() )
160  {
161 
162  char c = inputfile.peek();
163  if( c >= '0' && c <= '9' )
164  {
165  inputfile >> shell >> transition >> prob >> energy >> doubleconv;
166  probTotal = probTotal + prob;
167 
168  if( transition != oldtransition )
169  {
170  vector< int > tempvec;
171  fShell.push_back( tempvec );
172  vector< int > tempvec1;
173  fDoubleConv.push_back( tempvec1 );
174  vector< double > tempvec2;
175  fConvE.push_back( tempvec2 );
176  vector< double > tempvec3;
177  fConvProb.push_back( tempvec3 );
178  oldtransition = transition;
179  }
180 
181  fShell.back().push_back( shell );
182  fDoubleConv.back().push_back( doubleconv );
183  fConvE.back().push_back( energy );
184  fConvProb.back().push_back( prob );
185  }
186  else
187  {
188  char dump[ 200 ];
189  inputfile.getline( dump, 200 );
190  genmsg_debug( "KSGenConversion::ReadData "<<ret ); genmsg_debug( "dumping " << dump << " because " << c <<" is not a number" << eom );
191  continue;
192  }
193  }
194  }
195  else
196  {
197  genmsg( eError ) << "KSGenConversion::ReadData" << ret;
198  genmsg( eError ) << "could not open conversion data file" << eom;
199  }
200  fDataFile->Close();
201 
202  double total;
203 
204  for( unsigned int j = 0; j < fConvProb.size(); j++ )
205  {
206  vector< double > tempvec4;
207  fConvProbNorm.push_back( tempvec4 );
208  for( unsigned int i = 0; i < fConvProb.at( j ).size(); i++ )
209  {
210  probNorm = fConvProb.at( j ).at( i ) / probTotal;
211  fConvProbNorm.back().push_back( probNorm );
212  total = total + probNorm;
213  }
214  }
215 
216  return true;
217  }
218 
219 } //namespace Kassiopeia
std
STL namespace.
